Stimpack.description: Emergency medical stimulant. Restores 5 health immediately.

Med Nanites.description: Advanced medical nanobots. Restores 10 health and removes one negative status effect.

Cyberdeck.description: Standard hacking device. Required for bypassing electronic security and accessing networks.

ICEbreaker.description: Specialized program for breaking through corporate Intrusion Countermeasures Electronics.

Heavy Pistol.description: High-caliber handgun. Effective against unarmored targets.

Encrypted Phone.description: Secure communication device. Untraceable and encrypted.

Concealed Pistol.description: Small, easily hidden firearm. Lower damage but harder to detect.

Multi-tool.description: Versatile tool set. Useful for repairs and bypassing physical security.

Diagnostic Scanner.description: Analyzes electronic systems and cyberware for vulnerabilities.

Credchip.description: Digital wallet loaded with cryptocurrency. Universal payment method.

Neural Booster.description: Temporary intelligence enhancement. +2 Intelligence for 3 encounters.

Immunity Chip.description: Protects against common toxins and pathogens for 24 hours.

EMP Grenade.description: Disables electronic devices and cyberware in a small radius.

Memory Shard.description: Storage device for neural data and programs.

Security Keycard.description: Access card for security systems. Grants entry to restricted areas.

Specialized Data Shard.description: High-capacity data storage designed for secure extraction of sensitive information.

Facility Access Codes.description: Encrypted access codes for an Orison Industries research facility.

Zhi's Location Data.description: Digital coordinates and access information for reaching Zhi, a memory specialist.

Synth-Adrenaline.description: Combat stimulant that enhances reflexes and strength temporarily. +2 to Strength and Reflex for 3 encounters.

Neural Scrambler.description: Temporary disables enemies with cybernetic implants. Effective against most corporate security.

Tactical Visor.description: Enhanced reality display that highlights threats and vulnerabilities.

Black Market Cybereye.description: Aftermarket visual enhancement with thermal and electromagnetic spectrum capabilities.

Encrypted Datapad.description: Secure information storage with military-grade encryption. Contains sensitive information.

Stealth Cloak.description: Active camouflage technology that bends light around the wearer. Reduces detection chance.

Smart Bullets.description: Self-guided ammunition that increases accuracy and damage. Can be used with compatible firearms.

Subdermal Armor.description: Implanted protective mesh that reduces physical damage.

Trauma Pack.description: Emergency medical system that automatically stabilizes critical injuries.

Charisma Implant.description: Subtle facial muscle enhancers and voice modulation for improved social interactions.

Reinforced Jacket.description: Stylish armor disguised as street fashion. Offers moderate protection against physical attacks.

Corporate Access Card.description: Stolen corporate ID with mid-level clearance to corporate facilities.

Holo-Disguise.description: Projects a different appearance around the user. Duration limited by power cell capacity.

Neural Framework.description: Brain implant that enhances cognitive processing and memory recall.

Muscle Grafts.description: Synthetic muscle fibers integrated with natural tissue for enhanced strength.

Combat Stims.description: Tactical combat stimulant that enhances focus and critical hit chance.

Ballistic Shield.description: Portable energy shield that provides significant protection. Enhances defensive stance.

Tactical Scanner.description: Combat analysis device that reveals enemy weaknesses and resistances.

Smoke Grenade.description: Dense smoke cloud that provides temporary cover in combat.

Mono-filament Blade.description: Molecularly-sharpened blade that can cut through most armor. Causes bleeding damage.

Portable Cover.description: Deployable barrier that provides medium cover in combat situations.

Combat Drone.description: Small combat drone that attacks enemies automatically each turn.

Cybernetic Implant.description: Advanced combat implant that enhances physical capabilities.

Weakness Analyzer.description: Specialized scanner that analyzes and exploits enemy vulnerabilities.

Reinforcement Patch.description: Emergency reinforcement for armor and defensive systems.
